name: Kitten Killer
description:
Kitten Killer is a game where you have to kill kittens before the time runs out.

There is a handy tutorial in game to get to grips, then you have 60 seconds!

Watch out though, it's messy business.

This is an entry for the 33rd Ludum Dare competition, you can rate the game on the submission page.

Controls

Arrow Keys to Move

Space Bar to Shoot
